nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Sync Youtube Video Urls with Google Sheets

## Overview
Automated workflow: Sync Youtube Video Urls with Google Sheets. This workflow integrates 7 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, splitOut, set, stopAndError. It contains 12 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 12
- **Node Types**: 7
- **Error Handling**: ‚úÖ Implemented
- **Security**: ‚úÖ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ‚úÖ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Manual Trigger (When Clicking 'Test workflow'**: manualTrigger
- **Get Youtube Channel Ids from Google Sheet**: googleSheets
- **Get Youtube Video Urls form specific channel**: httpRequest
- **Format fields as required to save in google sheet**: set
- **Insert & Update Youtube Urls in Google Sheet**: googleSheets
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 46897f6d**: stopAndError
- ... and 2 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
